tweets.content: @opendatacon: Everything is going more real time in our world. Learn about the real time Open Data Potential in Room C. #IODC16pic.twitter.com/RTzqbtcu3L
@FIware: We'll talk today about the power of standards to manage real time open data & develop innovative solutions #IODC16http://sched.co/8Mwv

info: In this session, we learned about projects from the FIWARE accelerator and how these are mainly focusing on potential fair uses of real-time data for innovation.

session.description: FIWARE: unleashing the potential of real-time open data

conference_notes:
• Collaboration of stakeholders is key for contextual data to be created.
  • Design by commit is better to be overrode by design by application.
  • Standardization is the best way to unlock the potential of real-time data.
name: FIWARE: Unleashing the Potential of Real-time Open Data
